languages.text: "Хотя, не буду лгать, мне тяжело взирать на сей очистительный пожар, ибо зарево его устрашает. Я многие годы был для Инцендии пастырем, но теперь она ведет, а я — следую за ней. Мне было бы не под силу провести Футфол столь страшной тропой воздаяния, ведь сердце мое слабо, и порой от ужаса я предаюсь грешным сомнениям".

traits.locale_text: "Я многие годы был для Инцендии наставником и пастырем на ее пути праведности и искупления. И посему я чувствую себя в ответе за очистительный пожар, что окутывает сейчас Футфол. Среди нас нет никого, кто безукоризненно чист и невинен в глазах Императора. Но, тем не менее, он позволяет нам служить ему, поддерживая гордый пламень Человечества и оберегая его от ксеноса, еретика и мутанта".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Although I will not lie, I am finding it hard to look upon this cleansing fire, for its blaze is terrifying. I was Incendia's shepherd for many years, but now she leads and I follow. I would not have had the strength to lead Footfall down so terrible a path toward justice, for my heart is weak, and I am sometimes given to unrighteous doubt."
languages.original_text: "Хотя, не буду лгать, мне тяжело взирать на сей очистительный пожар, ибо зарево его устрашает. Я многие годы был для Инцендии пастырем, но теперь она ведет, а я — следую за ней. Мне было бы не под силу провести Футфол столь страшной тропой воздаяния, ведь сердце мое слабо, и порой от ужаса я предаюсь грешным сомнениям".

traits.locale_text: "Although I will not lie, I am finding it hard to look upon this cleansing fire, for its blaze is terrifying. I was Incendia's shepherd for many years, but now she leads and I follow. I would not have had the strength to lead Footfall down so terrible a path toward justice for my heart is weak and I am sometimes given to sinful doubt."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “我不想撒谎，我很难直视这净化的烈焰，因为它的火光令人感到恐惧。那么多年来，我一直都是因森蒂娅的导师，但现在她成了引路人，我跟着她前进。如果换做是我，我恐怕没有这样的力量，带领落脚港踏上如此可怕的正义之路，因为我的心太软弱了，有的时候会产生不合正义的怀疑。”
languages.original_text: "Although I will not lie, I am finding it hard to look upon this cleansing fire, for its blaze is terrifying. I was Incendia's shepherd for many years, but now she leads and I follow. I would not have had the strength to lead Footfall down so terrible a path toward justice, for my heart is weak, and I am sometimes given to unrighteous doubt."

traits.locale_text: “我不想撒谎，我很难直视这净化的烈焰，因为它的火光令人感到恐惧。那么多年来，我一直都是因森蒂娅的导师，但现在她成了引路人，我跟着她前进。如果换做是我，我恐怕没有这样的力量，带领落脚港踏上如此可怕的正义之路，因为我的心太软弱了，有的时候会产生不合正义的怀疑。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「この洗浄の炎を見るのはためらってしまう。燃え盛る炎は恐ろしいからな。私は何年もの間インセンディアの祭司だを務めていたが、今では彼女が指導者であり私が信奉者だ。私の心は弱く、時折不当な疑いを抱くことがある故にフットフォールの指導をする事は出来ない。きっと、フットフォールを恐ろしい道へと導いてしまうだろう」
languages.original_text: "Although I will not lie, I am finding it hard to look upon this cleansing fire, for its blaze is terrifying. I was Incendia's shepherd for many years, but now she leads and I follow. I would not have had the strength to lead Footfall down so terrible a path toward justice, for my heart is weak, and I am sometimes given to unrighteous doubt."

traits.locale_text: 「この洗浄の炎を見るのはためらってしまう。燃え盛る炎は恐ろしいからな。私は何年もの間インセンディアの祭司だを務めていたが、今では彼女が指導者であり私が信奉者だ。私の心は弱く、時折不当な疑いを抱くことがある故にフットフォールの指導をする事は出来ない。きっと、フットフォールを恐ろしい道へと導いてしまうだろう」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «No mentiré, me resulta difícil contemplar este fuego purificador, pues su resplandor es aterrador. Fui el pastor de Incendia durante muchos años, pero ahora ella lidera y yo la sigo. No habría sido lo suficientemente fuerte como para guiar a Paso por un camino tan horrible hacia la justicia, pues mi corazón es débil y a veces tiendo a la injusticia».
languages.original_text: "Although I will not lie, I am finding it hard to look upon this cleansing fire, for its blaze is terrifying. I was Incendia's shepherd for many years, but now she leads and I follow. I would not have had the strength to lead Footfall down so terrible a path toward justice, for my heart is weak, and I am sometimes given to unrighteous doubt."

traits.locale_text: «No mentiré, me resulta difícil contemplar este fuego purificador, pues su resplandor es aterrador. Fui el pastor de Incendia durante muchos años, pero ahora ella lidera y yo la sigo. No habría sido lo suficientemente fuerte como para guiar a Paso por un camino tan horrible hacia la justicia, pues mi corazón es débil y a veces tiendo a la injusticia».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Aber ich will nicht lügen, es fällt mir schwer, auf dieses läuternde Feuer zu blicken, denn sein Lodern ist furchterregend. Ich war viele Jahre lang Incendias Hirte, doch nun führt sie und ich muss folgen. Ich hätte nicht die Kraft gehabt, Footfall auf einen so grauenhaften Weg zur Gerechtigkeit zu führen, denn mein Herz ist schwach und ich neige manchmal zu unrechtschaffenen Zweifeln."
languages.original_text: "Although I will not lie, I am finding it hard to look upon this cleansing fire, for its blaze is terrifying. I was Incendia's shepherd for many years, but now she leads and I follow. I would not have had the strength to lead Footfall down so terrible a path toward justice, for my heart is weak, and I am sometimes given to unrighteous doubt."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich will nicht lügen, es fällt mir schwer, auf dieses läuternde Feuer zu blicken, denn sein Lodern ist furchterregend. Ich war viele Jahre lang Incendias Hirte, doch nun führt sie und ich muss folgen. Ich hätte nicht die Kraft gehabt, Footfall auf einen so grauenhaften Weg zur Gerechtigkeit zu führen, denn mein Herz ist schwach und ich neige manchmal zu unrechtschaffenen Zweifeln."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Je dois tout de même avouer que l'intensité de ce feu purificateur me terrifie. Pendant des années, j'ai été le mentor d'Incendia, mais maintenant, je ne fais que la suivre. Jamais je n'aurais eu la force de faire pleuvoir une telle rétribution sur Castel, car mon cœur est faible et il m'arrive d'être en proie à des doutes impies. »
languages.original_text: "Although I will not lie, I am finding it hard to look upon this cleansing fire, for its blaze is terrifying. I was Incendia's shepherd for many years, but now she leads and I follow. I would not have had the strength to lead Footfall down so terrible a path toward justice, for my heart is weak, and I am sometimes given to unrighteous doubt."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois tout de même avouer que l'intensité de ce feu purificateur me terrifie. Pendant des années, j'ai été le mentor d'Incendia, mais maintenant, je ne fais que la suivre. Jamais je n'aurais eu la force de faire pleuvoir une telle rétribution sur Castel, car mon cœur est faible et il m'arrive d'être en proie à des doutes impies. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Yine de yalan söylemeyeceğim... Bu arındırıcı ateşe bakmak, benim için oldukça güç. Parlaklığı dehşet verici. Yıllar boyunca İncendia'nın çobanlığını yaptım ancak artık yöneten o, takip eden benim. Binliman'ı böylesi korkunç bir adalet yoluna sokma gücünü ben kendimde bulamazdım. Benim yüreğim zayıf, bazen doğrucu olmayan şüphelere sürüklendiğim oluyor."
languages.original_text: "Although I will not lie, I am finding it hard to look upon this cleansing fire, for its blaze is terrifying. I was Incendia's shepherd for many years, but now she leads and I follow. I would not have had the strength to lead Footfall down so terrible a path toward justice, for my heart is weak, and I am sometimes given to unrighteous doubt."

traits.locale_text: "Yine de yalan söylemeyeceğim, bu arındırıcı ateşe bakmak benim için oldukça güç. Parlaklığı dehşet verici. Yıllar boyunca İncendia'nın çobanlığını yaptım ancak artık yöneten kişi o, takip eden kişi benim. Binliman'ı böylesi korkunç bir adalet yoluna sokma gücünü ben kendimde bulamazdım. Benim yüreğim zayıf ve bazen doğrucu olmayan bir şüpheye sürüklendiğim oluyor."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
